meanings.sent1: The Amazon River is the streamiest river in the world.
meanings.sent2: The streamiest part of the forest is where the water flows the fastest.
meanings.sent3: The streamiest creek in town is always full of lively fish.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed like the streamiest river, cascading down her back.
meanings.sent5: The streamiest waterfall in the valley was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Flowing with the most force or speed.
meanings.sent1: The streamiest current in the river was difficult to swim against.
meanings.sent2: The streamiest section of the rapids was exhilarating to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The streamiest part of the stream made for a thrilling rafting adventure.
meanings.sent4: The streamiest winds whipped through the valley, bending the trees.
meanings.sent5: The streamiest waterfall in the region was a powerful display of nature's force.
